languages.text: "Старик?.. Нет, Ангел не подобен скорбному телу человека... Он — прекрасен! Его облик боговдохновлен Многоруким Императором!.. Тебе же, неверн{mf|ый|ая}, была дарована честь лицезреть магуса, нашего благочинного пастыря... несущего весть". {n}Пленный бесновато хихикает.{/n} "Узри ты Ангела, ты выцарапал{mf||а} бы собственный мозг через глазницы... ибо осознал{mf||а} бы, сколь греш{mf|ен|на} перед ним!"

"Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"
languages.original_text: "Старик?.. Нет, Ангел не подобен скорбному телу человека... Он — прекрасен! Его облик боговдохновлен Многоруким Императором!.. Тебе же, неверн{mf|ый|ая}, была дарована честь лицезреть магуса, нашего благочинного пастыря... несущего весть". {n}Пленный бесновато хихикает.{/n} "Узри ты Ангела, ты выцарапал{mf||а} бы собственный мозг через глазницы... ибо осознал{mf||а} бы, сколь греш{mf|ен|на} перед ним!"

traits.locale_text: "Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were even granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the Angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"
"Old man? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Emperor-in-the-Void! You saw the Magus, our eminent guide... our messenger."

"Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"

"Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"

languages.text: «¿Viejo hechicero? No, el ángel no tiene una lamentable forma humana... ¡Es esplendor! ¡Su imagen es la inspiración divina del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos! Tú, infiel, has tenido el honor de contemplar al Magus, nuestro buen pastor... nuestro mensajero». {n}El prisionero suelta una carcajada demencial.{/n} «¡Si hubieses visto al ángel, te habrías arrancado los ojos y arañado el cerebro a través de las cuencas vacías al comprender lo indigno que eres de su presencia!».
languages.original_text: "Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Viejo hechicero? No, el ángel no tiene una lamentable forma humana... ¡Es esplendor! ¡Su imagen es la inspiración divina del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos! Tú, infiel, has tenido el honor de contemplar al Magus, nuestro buen pastor... nuestro mensajero». {n}El prisionero suelta una carcajada demencial.{/n} «¡Si hubieses visto al ángel, te habrías arrancado los ojos y arañado el cerebro a través de las cuencas vacías al comprender lo indigno que eres de su presencia!».

languages.text: 「ソーサラーですか？まさか、天使は哀れな人間の姿はしていません…輝きなのです！その姿は『多腕の皇帝』の聖なる発想のもととなったのです！信心のないあなたには、メイガスを、我らの善き羊飼い…我らの使者を見つめるという栄誉すら与えられた」{n}捕虜が狂ったような笑いを漏らす。{/n}「もしも天使を目の当たりになどすれば、お前はその眼窩から自分の脳みそを書き出すことだろう…その前で、己がいかに邪悪な存在であるのかを思い知って！」
languages.original_text: "Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"

「ソーサラーですか？まさか、天使は哀れな人間の姿はしていません…輝きなのです！その姿は『多腕の皇帝』の聖なる発想のもととなったのです！信心のないあなたには、メイガスを、我らの善き羊飼い…我らの使者を見つめるという栄誉すら与えられた」{n}捕虜が狂ったような笑いを漏らす。{/n}「もしも天使を目の当たりになどすれば、お前はその眼窩から自分の脳みそを書き出すことだろう…その前で、己がいかに邪悪な存在であるのかを思い知って！」

languages.text: “老巫师？不，天使根本不会以人类的可悲形象示人……天使是一切美好的化身！祂的面容就是四臂神皇的神圣启示！你这不虔之人，居然有幸见到了我们的教团教主，见到了我们善良的牧人……我们的信使。”{n}这个俘虏发出了疯狂的嗤笑声。{/n}“如果你见到的是天使，那你恐怕早就把自己的脑子挖出来了……因为在他面前，你会意识到你犯下的罪行有多么深重！”
languages.original_text: "Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"

traits.locale_text: “老巫师？不，天使根本不会以人类的可悲形象示人……天使是一切美好的化身！祂的面容就是四臂神皇的神圣启示！你这不虔之人，居然有幸见到了我们的教团教主，见到了我们善良的牧人……我们的信使。”{n}这个俘虏发出了疯狂的嗤笑声。{/n}“如果你见到的是天使，那你恐怕早就把自己的脑子挖出来了……因为在他面前，你会意识到你犯下的罪行有多么深重！”
“老巫师？不，天使根本不会以人类的可悲形象示人……天使是一切美好的化身！祂的面容就是四臂神皇的神圣启示！你这不虔之人，居然有幸见到了我们的教团教主，见到了我们善良的牧人……我们的信使。”{n}这个俘虏发出了疯狂的嗤笑声。{/n}“如果你见到的是天使，那你恐怕早就把自己的脑子挖出来了……因为在他面前，你会意识到你犯下的罪行有多么深重！”

languages.text: "Alter Hexer? Nein, der Engel ist hat keine erbärmliche menschliche Gestalt ... Er ist Glanz! Sein Antlitz ist eine göttliche Inspiration des vielarmigen Imperators! Ihr, Ungläubiger, hattet die Ehre, den Magus zu sehen, unseren guten Hirten ... unseren Boten." {n}Der Gefangene stößt ein verwirrtes Lachen aus.{/n} "Wärt Ihr des Engels ansichtig geworden, würdet Ihr Euer Hirn aus Euren Augenhöhlen kratzen ... denn Ihr würdet die Tiefe Eurer Sündhaftigkeit vor Ihm erkennen.
languages.original_text: "Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"

Ihr, Ungläubiger, hattet sogar die Ehre, den Magus zu sehen, unseren guten Hirten ... unseren Boten." {n}Der Gefangene stößt ein verwirrtes Lachen aus.{/n} "Wärt Ihr des Engels ansichtig geworden, würdet Ihr Euer Hirn aus Euren Augenhöhlen kratzen ... denn Ihr würdet die Tiefe Eurer Sündhaftigkeit vor Ihm erkennen.

Ihr, Ungläubiger, hattet sogar die Ehre, den Magus zu sehen, unseren guten Hirten ... unseren Boten." {n}Der Gefangene stößt ein verwirrtes Lachen aus.{/n} "Wärt Ihr des Engels ansichtig geworden, würdet Ihr Euer Hirn aus Euren Augenhöhlen kratzen ... denn Ihr würdet die Tiefe Eurer Sündhaftigkeit vor Ihm erkennen.

languages.text: « Un vieux sorcier ? Non, l'ange n'a rien de commun avec l'affligeante condition humaine... Il est la splendeur incarnée ! Son visage est le fruit de l'inspiration divine de l'Empereur aux mille bras ! Et vous, infâme {mf|mécréant|mécréante}, vous avez eu le privilège d'admirer le Magus, notre berger miséricordieux... notre messager. » {n}Le prisonnier laisse échapper un rire qui confine à la démence.{/n} « Si vous aviez le malheur de poser le regard sur l'ange, vous vous arracheriez la cervelle par les orbites... car vous prendriez alors toute la mesure de votre abjection à ses yeux ! »
languages.original_text: "Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"

Son visage est le fruit de l'inspiration divine de l'Empereur aux mille bras ! Et vous, infâme {mf|mécréant|mécréante}, vous avez eu le privilège d'admirer le Magus, notre berger miséricordieux... notre messager. » {n}Le prisonnier laisse échapper un rire qui confine à la démence.{/n} « Si vous aviez le malheur de poser le regard sur l'ange, vous vous arracheriez la cervelle par les orbites... car vous prendriez alors toute la mesure de votre abjection à ses yeux ! »

languages.text: "İhtiyar sahir mi? Hayır... Melek, acıklı bir insan suretinde değildir. O kusursuz güzelliktedir! Siması, Çok Kollu İmparator'dan ilahi bir esindir! Senin gibi inanç bilmeyen birine, muhterem önderimiz Magus'a... Müjdecimize bakışlarını yöneltme onuru bahşedildi." {n}Tutsak, meczuplara yaraşır bir şekilde kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Meleği seyre dalarsan ellerini göz yuvalarına sokup beynini kazımaya başlarsın... Çünkü onun huzurunda günahkârlığının ne kadar derinlere işlediğinin farkına varırsın!"
languages.original_text: "Old sorcerer? No, the angel is not of the woeful human form... He is splendour! His visage is a divine inspiration of the Many-Armed Emperor! You, faithless one, were granted the honour of gazing upon the Magus, our good shepherd... our messenger." {n}The captive lets out a deranged chuckle.{/n} "If you beheld the angel, you would scratch your own brain out through your eye sockets... for you would realise the depth of your wickedness before him!"
